entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Introduce a few overloads to StringBuilder to eliminate temp allocs #68450
  • Immutable*<T> classes do not perform well #68449
  • Improve event pipe thread time analysis by detecting blocking methods #68446
  • Segmentation fault in LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests (linux-arm64) #68443
  • Delete old workflow run entries from backport pipeline #68440
  • System.Text.Json Utf8JsonReader invalid json handling #68439
  • [Feature request]EventSource events for File IO #68435
  • Collectible AssemblyLoadContext is collected by GC while type from it is still alive #68434
  • Assert failure: CheckInstrBytePattern(epilogBase[offset] & X86_INSTR_RET, X86_INSTR_RET, epilogBase[offset]) || CheckInstrBytePattern(epilogBase[offset], X86_INSTR_JMP_NEAR_REL32, epilogBase[offset]) || CheckInstrWord(*PTR_WORD(epilogBase + offset), X86_INSTR_w_JMP_FAR_IND_IMM) #68431
    7.0.0

Closed

  • HttpResponseMessage.ToString() prints Content as an object #68369
  • Failed Assembly.Load and Assembly.LoadFile leaks memory #58093
    7.0.0
  • Implement PAL test for the PAL_GetResourceString #4130
    Future
  • Tests do not time-out on Linux #5802
    Future
  • Console can allocate too much on the stack with a custom encoding #68395
  • GC behavior under pressure? #6772
    Future
  • pin over SPMI has unexpectedly high variance #68214
    7.0.0
  • Test failure DllImportGenerator.UnitTests.IncrementalGenerationTests.ChangingMarshallingStrategy_RegeneratesStub #61643
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTests_netstandard17/EndInit_ResumesPausedEnableRaisingEvents(setBeforeBeginInit: True) #24181
    Future
  • Rolling build test failure: System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTests.FileSystemWatcher_Directory_Create_MultipleFilters with message "Created event did not occur as expected" #67601
    7.0.0
  • DateTime.ParseExact/ToString: inconsistent handling of abbreviated month names (MMM) in culture de-DE #68385

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve the redundant branch optimization to handle more side effects #68447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make PlatformDetection.IsInHelix lazy #68445
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Removed TempFile and TempDirectory from FileSystemWatcher Tests #68444
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update jitrollingbuild.py to use retrying download from jitutil.py #68442
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use unchecked barriers for stores to statics in more cases #68437
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use a faster sort algorithm pdqsort for Array.Sort #68436
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fixing API compat issues between ref/src for attributes on properties #68432
    breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

Merged

  • Fix leaks after unsuccessful assembly load #68203
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Check MultiCoreJit code cache before trying to jit method in mcj thread #67579
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove GT_ARGPLACE nodes #68140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix potential stack overflow in StdInReader #68398
    area-System.Console
  • Use a constant for stackalloc in Interop.Errors #68438
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add retries to some FSW tests #68368
    area-System.IO
  • Add more diagnostics to intermittently failing assert in JSON #68414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Measure JIT TP in superpmi-diffs #68292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix entry point for waveOutGetDevCaps #68418
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Don't remove GT_NO_OP "non-removable" NOP #68114
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Improve List performance in IEnumerable.SequenceEqual #67722
    area-System.Linq, no-recent-activity, community-contribution
  • Fixing and improving the `BOX;BR[COND]` pattern match #68382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix passing too small args for PUTARG_STK on macOS arm64 ABI #68113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Add perf-wasm pipeline #67312
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, no-recent-activity
  • Use checked arithmetic to prevent stack overflow in Pkcs12Kdf #68422
    area-System.Security
  • Use SystemNative_GetTimestamp to calculate BootTime #67589
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • ARM64 - Consolidate 'msub' and 'madd' logic #68363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] add support for parsing Unified TLS hello #68425
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #67527
    area-Meta, no-recent-activity
  • [WIP][wasm] Build with emscripten packages, instead of emsdk directly #67626
    area-Build-mono, no-recent-activity
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Handle more scenarios for loop cloning #67930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add requested version to hostfxr_resolve_sdk2 #68355
    area-Host
